title: Looks like League cucked itself
body:
RIP can't login to League server

EDIT: I'm back in boys :)

replies.body: For some reason, my brothers can log on, but I can't. Is it something to do with having a Mac?

You use a mac for league?


rip
u got dodo internet or something

What error message (if any) do you get when trying to log in? Is it specific to League, or are other online aspects affected? (so we know if it's likely to be on Riot's end, an ISP issue or, dare I say, an issue on your end) Anything else you can tell us about the issue?

There's nothing on the service status page as of yet, so no help there.

There was a new update for a new OS for Mac, Mac Sierra, which I got this morning, and installed while at work. Came back and finished it, but League would come up with the "no reponse from the server, attempting to try again"
Just League, everything else is working fine
Yeah, same. The internet works fine, hence how I'm saying this, it's just League atm
